generated_description:
### GiveAway: Your Community-Driven Marketplace for Used Goods

Founded in 2020 and proudly a part of Y Combinator's W20 batch, GiveAway is a San Francisco-based startup on a mission to revolutionize how we deal with our unwanted items. The idea is simple yet powerful: it's a community-driven marketplace designed to help users effortlessly get rid of things they no longer need, all without the hassle of time or money.

Imagine a virtual marketplace where users can bid on items using virtual coins, often snagging huge discounts—up to 95% off the retail price. GiveAway makes that a reality, creating a win-win scenario for both givers and receivers. You declutter your home while others find fantastic deals on things they want.

With a lean team of just one employee, the company focuses on bringing this simple yet innovative concept to market. Their group partner, Nan, adds strategic support to their operations, ensuring that they can navigate the lean startup journey effectively.

GiveAway tags itself under three key categories: marketplace, social-network, and San Francisco Bay Area. This highlights their combined value of networking, accessibility, and local community engagement.

If you're looking to declutter, save money, or just find interesting items, GiveAway is worth checking out. Their app is available on multiple platforms, making it easier than ever to join the community of savers and givers. 

So, why let things gather dust? Explore what GiveAway has to offer and dive into a marketplace where everything is almost free!

For more information, visit their website: [GiveAway](http://giveaway.mobi).
